name: Sky Hawk - Pocket Arcade Shooter
description:
The new Sky Hawk - Pocket Arcade Shooter series just came out in a spectacular style. Attack with your sky hawk and show your real power to the enemies in this game of war!
There are many scrolling shooters but none of them is like Sky Hawk . This stunning shoot 'em up game combines the classic arcade elements with the new possibilities offered by current technology.
Get ready for your device getting hot and your finger getting score. Prepare yourself for exciting new missions, more powerful enemies and breathtaking boss battles!
There's a satisfying number of planes to choose from. Each with different strengths and weaknesses.

Faetures :
- Beautiful and atmospheric levels with diverse missions to complete.
- Memorable battles with enormous bosses.
- Upgrade your shields, guns, missiles, lasers, mega-bombs and magnets.
- Boost your final score by completing in-game objectives on several difficulty modes.
- Accessible to casual gamers, as well as die-hard shooter addicts.
- Full voiceover and incredible electronic soundtrack.
